price: I Mi smo spasili njega i porodicu njegovu, sve osim žene njegove. Mi smo odredili da ona ostane s onima koji će kaznu iskusiti,
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnāhā mina al-ghābirīna
